cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eki

sentence.kanji: 駅はどこですか。
sentence.romaji: eki ha doko desu ka
sentence.english: Where's the station?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dame

sentence.kanji: 彼は駄目な男だ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha dame na otoko da
sentence.english: He's a loser.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kirei

sentence.kanji: 彼女はとても奇麗だ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha totemo kirei da
sentence.english: She's very beautiful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ekiin

sentence.kanji: 駅員に聞きましょう。
sentence.romaji: ekiin ni kikimashou
sentence.english: Let's ask the station employee.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanou

sentence.kanji: 20キロのダイエットは可能だと思いますか。
sentence.romaji: nijukiro no daieto ha kanou da to omoimasu ka
sentence.english: Do you think it's possible to go on a twenty kilogram diet?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keiken

sentence.kanji: 今日の試合はいい経験になりました。
sentence.romaji: kyou no shiai ha ii keiken ni narimashita
sentence.english: Today's game was a good experience.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nouryoku

sentence.kanji: 彼は能力のある社員です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha nouryoku no aru shain desu
sentence.english: He's a resourceful employee.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinou

sentence.kanji: このソフトにはいろいろな機能があります。
sentence.romaji: kono sofuto ni ha iroirona kinou ga arimasu
sentence.english: This software has a lot of various features.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joutai

sentence.kanji: ここは道の状態がとても悪いです。
sentence.romaji: koko ha michi no joutai ga totemo warui desu
sentence.english: The road is in a very bad state here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jiken

sentence.kanji: 科学の授業で実験をした。
sentence.romaji: kagaku no jugyou de jiken wo shita
sentence.english: We did an experiment in science class.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuushajou

sentence.kanji: 車は駐車場に止めてください。
sentence.romaji: kuruma ha chuushajou ni tomete kudasai
sentence.english: Please park the car in the parking lot.

cards.english: make a racket, mess around, make a fuss
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sawagu

sentence.kanji: 電車の中で騒がないでください。
sentence.romaji: densha no naka de sawaganai de kudasai
sentence.english: Please don't make a racket in the train.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's odoroku

sentence.kanji: 彼は血を見て驚いた。
sentence.romaji: kare ha chi wo mite odoroita
sentence.english: He was surprised to see blood.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiken

sentence.kanji: 明日の試験、頑張ってね。
sentence.romaji: ashita no shiken ganbate ne
sentence.english: Good luck on tomorrow's exam.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uma

sentence.kanji: 彼は牧場で馬に乗った。
sentence.romaji: kare ha bokujou de uma ni nota
sentence.english: He rode a horse at the ranch.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's baka

sentence.kanji: 私は馬鹿だった。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha baka data
sentence.english: I was foolish.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chinou

sentence.kanji: あの子の知能はとても高いそうです。
sentence.romaji: ano ko no chinou ha totemo takai sou desu
sentence.english: Apparently, that child is highly intelligent.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nou

sentence.kanji: 先日、初めて能を見に行きました。
sentence.romaji: senjitsu hajimete nou wo mi ni ikimashita
sentence.english: The other day, I went to see Noh for the first time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukanou

sentence.kanji: レポートを1日で仕上げるのは不可能です。
sentence.romaji: repo-to wo 1 nichi de shiageru no ha fukanou desu
sentence.english: It's impossible to finish up the report in a day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ekimae

sentence.kanji: 駅前に交番が有ります。
sentence.romaji: ekimae ni kouban ga arimasu
sentence.english: There is a police box in front of the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seinou

sentence.kanji: 今度のパソコンは性能がすごく良い。
sentence.romaji: kondo no pasokon ha seinou ga sugoku ii
sentence.english: The performance of this new computer is extremely good.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juken

sentence.kanji: 日本語能力試験を受験したんだ。
sentence.romaji: nihongo nouryoku shiken wo juken shita n da
sentence.english: I took the Japanese proficiency test.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honnou

sentence.kanji: 動物は本能のまま動くね。
sentence.romaji: doubutsu ha honnou no mama ugoku ne
sentence.english: Animals act purely on instinct.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ekichou

sentence.kanji: 彼は駅長です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ekichou desu
sentence.english: He is a stationmaster.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuunou

sentence.kanji: 彼女はとても有能な部下です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha totemo yuunou na buka desu
sentence.english: She's a very capable subordinate.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's munou

sentence.kanji: 彼は無能だ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha munou da
sentence.english: He's incapable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nou

sentence.kanji: 彼は勉強するしか能のない人間だね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha benkyou suru shika nou no nai ningen da ne
sentence.english: He's the kind of person who only knows how to study.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sainou

sentence.kanji: 彼は芸術的な才能にあふれているね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha geijutsuteki na sainou ni afurete iru ne
sentence.english: He is full of artistic talent.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nouritsu

sentence.kanji: この方法だと能率がいいですね。
sentence.romaji: kono houhou da to nouritsu ga ii desu ne
sentence.english: Using this method is more efficient.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jitai

sentence.kanji: その会社の経営の実態を調査中だ。
sentence.romaji: sono kaisha no keiei no jitai wo chousachuu da
sentence.english: The state of that company's management is being investigated.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taido

sentence.kanji: あの男の態度にみんなあきれてたよ。
sentence.romaji: ano otoko no taido ni minna akirete ta yo
sentence.english: Everyone was tired of the man's attitude.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jitai

sentence.kanji: 事態は深刻です。
sentence.romaji: jitai ha shinkoku desu
sentence.english: The situation is serious.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taiken

sentence.kanji: 今日、珍しい体験をしました。
sentence.romaji: kyou mezurashii taiken wo shimashita
sentence.english: Today, I had an unusual experience.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's houshanou

sentence.kanji: この地区は放射能に汚染されたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kono chiku ha houshanou ni osen sareta n da
sentence.english: This area has been contaminated by radioactivity.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's geki

sentence.kanji: 小学校で子供たちの劇を見ました。
sentence.romaji: shougakou de kodomotachi no geki wo mimashita
sentence.english: I saw a children's play at an elementary school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gekijou

sentence.kanji: 午後8時に劇場の前で会いましょう。
sentence.romaji: gogo hachiji ni gekijou no mae de aimashou
sentence.english: Let's meet in front of the theater at 8:00 pm.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kigeki

sentence.kanji: 昨夜はテレビで喜劇を見たよ。
sentence.romaji: sakuya ha terebi de kigeki wo mita yo
sentence.english: I watched a comedy show on TV last night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's higeki

sentence.kanji: あの悲劇を繰り返してはいけない。
sentence.romaji: ano higeki wo kurikaeshite ha ikenai
sentence.english: You must not repeat that tragedy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuusha

sentence.kanji: 車はここに駐車してください。
sentence.romaji: kuruma ha koko ni chuusha shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please park the car here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sawagi

sentence.kanji: 一体何の騒ぎですか。
sentence.romaji: itai nan no sawagi desu ka
sentence.english: What on earth is the commotion?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sawagashii

sentence.kanji: 何だか表が騒がしい。
sentence.romaji: nandaka omote ga sawagashii
sentence.english: It is noisy outside, for some reason.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's souon

sentence.kanji: 窓から車の騒音が入って来ます。
sentence.romaji: mado kara kuruma no souon ga haite kimasu
sentence.english: The noise of the cars is coming through the window.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's soudou

sentence.kanji: 警察がやって来て騒動を静めたんだ。
sentence.romaji: keisatsu ga yatekite soudou wo shizumeta n da
sentence.english: The police came and calmed the riot.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's souzoushii

sentence.kanji: 隣の家はいつも騒々しい。
sentence.romaji: tonari no ie ha itsumo souzoushii
sentence.english: The house next door is always noisy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's odorokasu

sentence.kanji: あなたを驚かす話があります。
sentence.romaji: anata wo odorokasu hanashi ga arimasu
sentence.english: I have a story that will surprise you.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taisei

sentence.kanji: 作業を始める態勢は整っています。
sentence.romaji: sagyou wo hajimeru taisei ha totonote imasu
sentence.english: The preparations for starting work are completed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hifu

sentence.kanji: 冬は皮膚が乾燥しますね。
sentence.romaji: fuyu ha hifu ga kansou shimasu ne
sentence.english: My skin dries out in winter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suisen

sentence.kanji: 彼は会長に推薦されたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kaichou ni suisen sareta yo
sentence.english: He was recommended to the chairman.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikishiken

sentence.kanji: その会社の筆記試験は難しかったよ。
sentence.romaji: sono kaisha no hikishiken ha muzukashikata yo
sentence.english: That company's written examination was difficult.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's odoroki

sentence.kanji: 彼女は驚きを隠せませんでしたよ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha odoroki wo kakusemasendeshita yo
sentence.english: She was not able to conceal her surprise.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muda

sentence.kanji: それは時間の無駄です。
sentence.romaji: sore ha jikan no muda desu
sentence.english: It's a waste of time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mudazukai

sentence.kanji: これは税金の無駄遣いだね。
sentence.romaji: kore ha zeikin no mudazukai da ne
sentence.english: This is a waste of tax money.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakeru

sentence.kanji: 子供たちは広場に駆けて行ったわよ。
sentence.romaji: kodomotachi ha hiroba ni kakete ita wa yo
sentence.english: The children rushed into the square.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakeashi

sentence.kanji: 駅まで駆け足で行ったよ。
sentence.romaji: eki made kakeashi de ita yo
sentence.english: I ran to the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's futou

sentence.kanji: 水が沸騰したよ。
sentence.romaji: mizu ga futou shita yo
sentence.english: The water boiled.
